column4: *(could someone help me about an internet connection pb with ubuntu please ^^ ?)
hi L3th3M_
why not just ask?
: don't want ennoye everyone :P. I have a sagem fast 800 usb modem, and couldn't find how i could use it on my ubuntu
http://www.larsen-b.com/Article/143.html
click on the link.  Hope you can read French.  ;)
: thank for the link, i'll see it:)
: i am french, so no pb :)
looks like the Eagle driver is included in 2.6.
Did you browse around the wiki on that link I sent you?
: yes.
: but like i forgot to wrote it on something, could you please regive it to me ? ^^;;
sure.  But I found another one first.  :)
: i look at it, thanks :)
make sure to click on the link in the third comment.
: oki, thanks :)
Is it an ADSL modem?  Would the eagle-adsl-tools package be relevant?
: yes, mine is a adsl usb modem, and one supported by the eagle driver. in fact i remember i was forced to install it on the mandrake 10 also...
reinstall the driver?  Why?
That's a rather large can of worms to open...
: like i have a eagle.ko already on, but see nowhere the modem in access, i think i must install the eagle driver in complete form, so re-install it
Unless the kernel driver is really old, I doubt it...
: i don't have eagleconfig nor startadsl on the system
